definition: to receive/to answer (the phone)/to meet or welcome sb/to connect/to catch/to join/to extend/to take one's turn on duty/to take over for sb
thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)

sentences.english: The neutral and main terminal box shall be located at the both opposite sides of motor.
sentences.chinese: 中性点接线盒和主接线盒应位于电动机相反两侧。

sentences.english: The neutral and main terminal box shall be located at the both opposite sides of motor.
sentences.chinese: 中性点接线盒和主接线盒应位于电动机相反两侧。

sentences.english: Insert the end of the cable into the terminal box .
sentences.chinese: 将电缆末端插入接线盒。

sentences.english: Thermocouples may be routed through the flexible conduit to the outlet box.
sentences.chinese: 热电偶可能会通过一条柔软的导线管通到接线盒。

sentences.english: The junction box should be sealed to keep it from rainwater.
sentences.chinese: 接线盒应密封，防止雨水进入。

sentences.english: Mounted into the side of the panel will be a multi-pin electrical connector to connect the remote control cable to.
sentences.chinese: 安装入面板边的将是连接遥控电缆的多引线的接线盒。

sentences.english: Take off the cover of junction box.
sentences.chinese: 撬开后取下接线盒盒盖。

sentences.english: It is preferred that the different boxes, bulkheads etc be grouped together.
sentences.chinese: 建议一起编组使用不同的接线盒和隔板等。

sentences.english: Unplug the combination flasher from the junction block.
sentences.chinese: 从接线盒中拔出组合闪光器。
